name: PlayStation Portal™ Remote Player for PS5® console
name-description: Play your PS5® console over your home Wi-Fi with console quality controls using PlayStation Portal remote player.3
description: PlayStation Portal™ Remote Player gives you access to the games on your PS5 over your home Wi-Fi1, letting you jump right into gaming without needing to play on a TV.

name: Access™ controller
name-description: Introducing the Access controller, a versatile controller kit that can be customised to meet players’ diverse needs.
description: Introducing the Access controller, a versatile controller kit that can be customised to meet players’ diverse needs, designed in close collaboration with the accessibility community to help players with disabilities play more comfortably for longer.

name: PULSE Elite™ wireless headset
description: Surround yourself with lifelike sound in your favourite games with the PULSE Elite™ wireless headset.

name: PULSE Explore™ wireless earbuds
description: Enjoy lifelike gaming audio wherever play takes you with the PULSE Explore wireless earbuds.

name: Chroma collection
description: Introducing the Chroma Collection – iridescent PlayStation®5 accessories that shine, shimmer and shift colour from every angle.

name: HD Camera
description: Put yourself at the center of your gameplay sharing with the HD camera for PS5 consoles.

name: Flight sticks
description: Take to the skies and fly with total control on PS4 or PS5 consoles thanks to the life-sized, super-responsive throttle, dual-rudder joystick and fully mappable buttons contained in this officially licensed flight stick from Thrustmaster.
